com.rivelbop.rivelworks.input

Class FirstPersonCam

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.InputAdapter
      • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.input.FirstPersonCam
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FirstPersonFlyCam

    public class FirstPersonCam
extends com.badlogic.gdx.InputAdapter
    A basic first person camera without movement.
    Author:
    David Jerzak (RivelBop)
